name: AISuperDomain (win4r)
description: [项目级] Aila(AI超元域): The premier AI integration tool for Windows, macOS, and Android. Ask once, get answers from 10+ AIs like ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude3, Copilot, Poe, perplexity and more. Features customizable AI and prompts.。来源: https://github.com/win4r/AISuperDomain

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Aila(AI超元域): The premier AI integration tool for Windows, macOS, and Android. Ask once, get answers from 10+ AIs like ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude3, Copilot, Poe, perplexity and more. Features customizable AI and prompts.

来源: https://github.com/win4r/AISuperDomain
语言: C#
Stars: 1830

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content: To begin using Aila, download the latest version from [Aila Releases](https://github.com/win4r/AISuperDomain/releases). Follow the instructions below based on your operating system to ensure a smooth installation process.

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
AiConfig.cs
Aila.csproj
Aila.sln
App.xaml
App.xaml.cs
AppConfiguration.cs
AppShell.xaml
AppShell.xaml.cs
ConfigPage.xaml
ConfigPage.xaml.cs
ConfigurationManager.cs
ConfigurationUpdatedMessage.cs
CurrentAi.cs
LICENSE
MainPage.xaml
MainPage.xaml.cs
MauiProgram.cs
Platforms
Platforms/Android
Platforms/MacCatalyst
